main event: On July 27, 1961, an unidentified object appeared on radar screen north of Dayton, Ohio, moving at high speed before suddenly disappearing.
interesting points: The object was observed only for a brief duration of 0.3 minutes., The object initially appeared as a bright dot on the radar., The object could not be tracked for longer than 0.3 minutes., It was reported to be moving at a very high speed., The case remains classified as unidentified according to the conclusions.
